TopicTitle: [WIP] [1.0.5] (Dev Paused) QuizTech Aero Pack v1.2.9.x | Updated: 8/9/15 |

Articles.Content:
> 
> I'd like to be able to see QuizTech in the "sort by manufacturer" mode of the parts-selector. Would make finding certain parts a **lot** easier.

I could try to see about that ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Those are great parts!
> 
> 
> **Might I suggest creating node only variants of the VTOL parts?**
> 
> Especially the Razor and K35B parts would be great with nodes instead of engines. It would allow the usage of eg rocket engines in VTOL configuration.
> 
> As a long term prospect, it might even be possible to give them inferal robotics code, to allow thrust vector adjustments during flight.
> 
> And although that would be one direction only, it would also solve the space shuttle thrust design problem (if the cover could be deactivated, which opens up when the engine goes into VTOL config).

Thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I could see about this too, just gotta find time! My summer is going to be pretty busy but I will try to work on some things when I can ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I hope it's because of the version of KSP but the IVA of the Mk2 Lightning Cockpit doesn't work like it should w/ RPM.

> 
> I hope it's because of the version of KSP but the IVA of the Mk2 Lightning Cockpit doesn't work like it should w/ RPM.

Noticed the same thing... Everything else seems ok ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Love your work, any chance we could see some wings/controlled surfaces added to the next release? Something like the Retro Future mod?
Is this affected at all by the thermal changes in 1.0.3/1.0.4?

> 
> I'd like to be able to see QuizTech in the "sort by manufacturer" mode of the parts-selector. Would make finding certain parts a **lot** easier.

Use [Filter Extensions](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104231). It changes the "sort by manufacturer" into a kind of "sort by mod" category.
Any estimate of how long it'll be until 1.0.4 support is added?

> 
> Any estimate of how long it'll be until 1.0.4 support is added?

It'll be when I find some down time to fix up some issues. I've been busy with a new job and haven't been able to do much unfortunately. I'll see what I can do when I have the opportunity ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I found a little bug (or a feature?)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ob4MR)

it also gives a slight torque when not gimballing, but its barely noticeable.

> 
> It'll be when I find some down time to fix up some issues. I've been busy with a new job and haven't been able to do much unfortunately. I'll see what I can do when I have the opportunity ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I'm looking forward to it, I love this mod!!
Wow this is cool, just perfect too. I was looking for a mod that revamps stock aero, without the size of B9 or the style of firespitter!

I haven't had a chance to test the cause yet, but I am not able to open/close the new service bay in or out of the VAB, nor assign it to action groups. Relatedly, whenever a vessel is loaded, or whenever a new service bay is selected, the close animation is immediately played. Is this a know bug? I know that the latest version is not listed as working with 1.0.4, but this is the only problem I've encountered.

This feels like a stupid question, but how do I reset the hover modes on the provided stock vehicles.

All the action groups from 4 down just aren't there.

I want the Helicarrier to hover!
How do I change the IVA textures to B9? I have been trying to change it, but I do not know where the things go in the game files.

Minor issue with the config patches: the HotRockets patches should be :NEEDS[HotRockets]:FOR[QuizTechAero] rather than :FOR[HotRockets]. :FOR[HotRockets] tells MM that the HotRockets mod exists even if it doesn't.

EDIT: It should also be MP\_Nazari rather than HotRockets

awesome mod dude, but i must bring something up to you. i feel that you have somehow misplaced, or completely forgotten about, Mk2 Fuselages. i can't find anything of the sort to make the plane that i wish to make, which requires kerosene, and that is only in the stock parts i have... think you can work on that or help me find the parts i need??? thanks

EDIT: so i couldn't help but notice my problem also. figured out that you used the stock Mk2 fuselage, but for some reason, it turned out like this...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-01T09:19:31Z" title="08/01/2015 09:19  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 1, 2015</time> by Corinlee**
  
found a problem

I have a question. The Thunderbolt cockpit is giving me a great deal of trouble with several of it's buttons and features. For example, I can't get the back button to work correctly with VesselViewer, nor with the Mechjeb. Everytime I try to hit 'back', it just takes me to the core menu for those things, and reentering the tool brings me back to the screen I was at.

Hey all, I've been reading your comments and have noted all of the issues that you guys are facing. It's been a while since I've had any time at all to work on this project, but I have some ideas for more parts in the future, so stay tuned. I will try to update for 1.0.4 soon, but in the meantime you can have a look at this which I worked on today..

More progress^

Looks good.

Happy for any new parts with this mod.

Really good stuff, thanks.

Cheers.
That new cockpit looks so amazing and the progress ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

I was having....issues.....with your F-35 engine/fan parts...

It made FAR only calculate lift for the root part, so....yeah......Bad things happened.
those are awesome. Can't wait to use them.

@minepaga: I will look into FAR compatibility for sure ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

@Kerbas\_ad\_astra: Thanks for spotting that, I will see if I can get it fixed using the method you suggested.

For the next update I'm thinking helicopters....Anyone interested? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Apache inspired attack helicopter cockpit. Will have a stock-a-like texture and also instruments added to the nose ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![XO7R4ioh.png](http://i.imgur.com/XO7R4ioh.png)

Cargo helicopter fuselages inspired by the CH-47 Chinook. Once I figure out the lengths I want for them I'll add windows. I envision at least two different length fuselage pieces, a cargo ramp tail section, an adapter to 2.5m, and a cockpit to match ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![DgjrJB8h.png](http://i.imgur.com/DgjrJB8h.png)

Quiztech is Back! with a strong return too!

(I'm Wafle)

Love the new shuttle command pod, and btw, if you're gonna make chinook parts you need adapters/cockpits for it.
